3: After blowing up a few more walls, Karenina runs into another Construct underground...
Why are you here...?
You almost blew me up!
They sent you here for a mission! Not total annihilation!
It's just a bit of gunpowder... Stop being such a baby.
Well, we're here already, so let's exchange some information. What have you found?
I've found some samples that resemble an antigen to the Punishing Virus.
(Takes out a handful of gold dust) So have I...
...Hand it over. Let me run some tests.
...Both of them are fundamentally the same kind of nanotechnology.
But it is very unstable in suppressing the virus...
You're right! It's super unstable!
It suppresses the virus, and then it weakens the Corrupted, doesn't it?
But it doesn't take long for the Corrupted to get up again. Stranger still, some of them would return to their original power level...
Have you fought the Corrupted here? In the Golden Vortex?
Let me tell you the whole story...
From what you said, this antigen is highly unstable. We must report this to Babylonia...
If you're coming with me, then you better help out! Don't let me see you slacking!
Right as she finishes speaking, she blows up another wall...
...Wait for me!
